body: Im online now no mods are on and have spotted 2 Kill aura hackers in just one game on nebula and have spectated them, and got evidence! Elementprohd has made a player report on 1 player but i have not recorder to record others HELP!
body_tagged: Im online now no mods are on and have spotted 2 Kill aura hackers in just one game on nebula and have spectated them, and got evidence! Elementprohd has made a player report on 1 player but i have not recorder to record others HELP!
title: MODS HELP!

replies.body: Just find someone to record them. No point in making a forum post about it.
replies.body_tagged: Just find someone to record them. No point in making a forum post about it.

replies.body: just report em and chill out bud
replies.body_tagged: just report em and chill out bud

replies.body:
If you would like to get a free recording software, I would recommend camtasia.
If you do see a hacker and are unable to record them, use the /report command or tell someone else who is in the game to spectate and record them.

Don't worry, Staff Applications are opening up, so there will be more moderators in the future to come to your reports.
